pci_projects_project_regions_description: OVHcloud offers several locations for creating infrastructure or containers. You start with a few default locations, with the option to add more.
pci_projects_project_regions_info_messag: Adding new locations may take a few minutes. Once you’ve added these locations, you can add a server or container.
pci_projects_project_regions_add_region_: An error has occurred adding the location: {{message}}
Activating location {{ code }}; this may take up to 60 minutes. You’ll be notified by email once the location is available.
